content: come crochet with me for annie s ghost will be free how many can be created before all hallows eve this is just a cute little ghost that is a great scrap buster the hands can be connected if you wish to make an easy garland for the first time i made a video to show the whole pattern so come join the fun https //youtu be/ou_wp-gt6qa additional photos provided by my wonderful testers jerica smith margie smith and jen bee
